asset.hookText:
Subscribe to our channel:
http://bit.ly/12dY9oO

Learn more about Petco training!
http://www.petco.com/dogtraining

Bringing a new pet home for the first time is exciting! Petco gives you some tips about how you can puppy proof your home for your new pet.

Things to remember:

Stock your home with the essentials
- High quality dog food; food and water bowls
- Properly sized crate and doggie bed
- 6 foot leash, collar, and ID tags
- Stuffable chew toys

Make your home safe and dog-friendly
- Use outlet covers
- Tuck away electrical cords
- Use cord containers
- Use proper screening for your fireplace
- Keep lit candles out of reach
- Keep counters clear of dangerous objects
- Put away food temptations
- Lock cabinets containing harmful items
- Use covered trash cans
- Always keep the toilet bowl lid down

Something extraordinary happens when pets and people connect. A unique bond is formed that results in something powerful, not only between pets and people, but in a way that makes the world a better place. Our promise is to nurture that relationship completely - mind and body.
